sourcesContent:
// client/src/components/InputData.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const InputData = ({ navigateTo }) => { // Main form state const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Data Pribadi name: '', birthDate: '', gender: '', address: '', religion: '', joinDate: '', // Data Kesehatan generalCondition: '', medicalHistory: '', allergies: '', smoking: '', alcohol: '', // Data Obat medicationStatus: '', medicationType: '', dosage: '', schedule: '', // Pemeriksaan Hematologi hemoglobin: '', leukocyte: '', erythrocyte: '', // Data Gula Darah bloodSugarRandom: '', bloodSugarFasting: '', bloodSugarTwoHour: '', // Kondisi Fungsional walkingAbility: '', eatingAbility: '', // Kondisi Mental emotionalCondition: '', consciousness: '', // Video dan Gambar files: [] }); // Guardian state (can have multiple) const [guardians, setGuardians] = useState([ { name: '', idNumber: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '' } ]); // Handle main form input changes const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; // Handle guardian input changes const handleGuardianChange = (index, field, value) => { const updatedGuardians = [...guardians]; updatedGuardians[index][field] = value; setGuardians(updatedGuardians); }; // Add new guardian const addGuardian = () => { setGuardians([ ...guardians, { name: '', idNumber: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '' } ]); }; // Remove guardian const removeGuardian = (index) => { if (guardians.length > 1) { const updatedGuardians = guardians.filter((_, i) => i !== index); setGuardians(updatedGuardians); } }; // Handle file upload const handleFileChange = (e) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, files: [...e.target.files] })); }; const calculateAge = (birthDate) => { if (!birthDate) return ''; const today = new Date(); const birth = new Date(birthDate); let age = today.getFullYear() - birth.getFullYear(); const monthDiff = today.getMonth() - birth.getMonth(); // Adjust age if birthday hasn't occurred this year if (monthDiff < 0 || (monthDiff === 0 && today.getDate() < birth.getDate())) { age--; } return age; }; // Form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Prepare data for backend const residentData = { resident: { name: formData.name, age: formData.age, birth_date: formData.birthDate, gender: formData.gender, address: formData.address, religion: formData.religion, join_date: formData.joinDate }, healthData: { condition: formData.generalCondition, medical_history: formData.medicalHistory, allergies: formData.allergies, smoking: formData.smoking, alcohol: formData.alcohol, medication_status: formData.medicationStatus, medication_type: formData.medicationType, dosage: formData.dosage, schedule: formData.schedule, hemoglobin: formData.hemoglobin, leukocyte: formData.leukocyte, erythrocyte: formData.erythrocyte, blood_sugar_random: formData.bloodSugarRandom, blood_sugar_fasting: formData.bloodSugarFasting, blood_sugar_two_hour: formData.bloodSugarTwoHour, walking_ability: formData.walkingAbility, eating_ability: formData.eatingAbility, emotional_condition: formData.emotionalCondition, consciousness: formData.consciousness }, guardians: guardians.filter(g => g.name) // Only include guardians with names }; // Send to backend const response = await axios.post('/api/residents', residentData); if (response.data.success) { alert('Data berhasil disimpan!'); navigateTo('list'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error saving data:', error); alert('Terjadi kesalahan saat menyimpan data.'); } }; return (

{/* Data Kesehatan */}

{/* Data Wali */}
{guardians.map((guardian, index) => (
Data Wali {index + 1}
{guardians.length > 1 && ( )}
handleGuardianChange(index, 'name', e.target.value)} placeholder="Nama lengkap wali" />
handleGuardianChange(index, 'idNumber', e.target.value)} placeholder="Nomor KTP wali" />
handleGuardianChange(index, 'email', e.target.value)} placeholder="email@contoh.com" />
handleGuardianChange(index, 'phone', e.target.value)} placeholder="08xxxxxxxxxx" />
))}
); }; export default InputData;
